sense.def: Pathological Condition of a ju 疽 , impediment-illness, located in the depth of the tissue. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 有久癰余瘡，敗為深疽者，在腨脛間，喜生瘡中水惡露，寒凍不瘥，經 年成骨疽 , “When an obstruction-illness or any other sores last for a long time, [and the patient’s condition] deteriorates with the generation of deep-reaching impediment-illnesses , sores filled with water and malign dew tend to develop in the region of his calves and shins. If they are exposed to freezing cold and are not healed, in the course of several years, they will form bone impediment-illnesses”.
